AboutMe.aboutMeBody: I'm a self-taught web developer working to become a front-end engineer. My skills includes JavaScript ES6, HTML5, CSS3, and React. I'm actively looking for opportunities that will allow me to practice and develop my coding and design skills. I love experimenting with new technologies and connecting with fellow developers. I'm particularly interested in working with local businesses and artists in Philadelphia. I'm always seeking to grow and learn; contact me with any questions, or just to say hello!
